definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The research center is carrying out a thorough study of this metal's superconductivity.
sentences.chinese: 正在对这种金属的超导电性进行深入研究。

sentences.english: Modification with conductive materials to increase specific capacity at high current density.
sentences.chinese: 导电性物质的修饰以提高其在大电流密度下的比容量。

sentences.english: In the paper, the alternative characters of current electric conduction of rock-coal porous medium with gas are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了煤岩多孔介质及其充瓦斯后的交流导电性。

sentences.english: Sometimes the carbon rods are copper coated to improve electrical conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 有时这些碳棒包上一层铜，以增加其导电性。

sentences.english: Higher the content of reactants and the sintering temperature are, better the electrical property is.
sentences.chinese: 反应原材料成分及烧结温度越高则导电性能越好。

sentences.english: On this drive contacts covered with thin layer of gold, for better conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 在此驱动器的接触与一层薄金，为更好的导电性。

sentences.english: The problem on granular superconductivity is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 还对颗粒超导电性的问题进行了讨论。

sentences.english: The flux has advantages of appropriate melting point , good fluidness and good conductivity .
sentences.chinese: 这种焊剂具有合适的熔点，良好的流动性及导电性。

sentences.english: Copper conducts electricity better than iron does.
Conductivity and thermo-stability of B-doped diamond increased with boron contents increasing.
sentences.chinese: 含硼金刚石热稳定性和导电性随着硼含量增加而提高。

sentences.english: Many plastics have high surface resistance and low electrical conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 很多塑料具有高的表面电阻和低的导电性能。

sentences.english: The superconductivity in effective repulsive interaction between two electrons is considered.
sentences.chinese: 分析了电子间在有效排斥互作用下的超导电性。

sentences.english: Perfect conductivity is the first traditional hallmark of super- conductivity .
sentences.chinese: 完全导电性是超导电性的第一个传统的检验标志。

sentences.english: Perfect conductivity is the first traditional hallmark of super- conductivity .
sentences.chinese: 完全导电性是超导电性的第一个传统的检验标志。

sentences.english: All metals do not conduct electricity equally well.
sentences.chinese: 金属都具有同样好的导电性能。

sentences.english: This paper described how to study superconductivity by ac susceptibility(acs) measurements.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨利用交流磁化率研究超导电性。
